Our Solid State Drives
We only use Pure Solid State Drives in RAID 10 configurations for our KVM VPS's. The RAID 10 configuration offers superior speeds and a high level of redundancy.

DDoS Mitigation
Our protection shields from Layer 3/4 attacks - but it also effectively protects against the much harder to detect Layer 7 attack.
You can read more about our DDoS Mitigation here: MightWeb DDoS Mitigation

Choice of Operating System
Note: Not finding your favorite? Contact us and we just might be able to add it!
CentOS: - CentOS 6 / CentOS 7
Debian: - Debian 7 / Debian 8
Scientific Linux: - Scientific Linux 6
Ubuntu: - Ubuntu 14.04
Fedora: - Fedora 20 Server
Linux Mint: - Linux Mint 17 Desktop XFCE
Windows Server: Windows Server 2012 R2

Frequently asked questions
Q: Are you a reseller?
A: No, we are not a reseller. We own and operate our own infrastructure.

Q: What virtualization?
A: We utilize KVM Virtualization for all of our Virtual Private Servers.

Q: What payment methods do you accept?
A: We accept PayPal, Credit Cards and BitCoin.

Q: Can I, as a client outside of the US/Canada, order from you?
A: Absolutely! Keep in mind that due to VAT, prices may differ if you're ordering from the EU.

Q: Do you have Windows-hosting?
A: Yes, we do! See our Windows Server Hosting plans.

Q: Can I choose which distribution to run?
A: Yes, you can. We have multiple distribution to choose from! If we don't have your flavor, let us know and we might be able to add it!

Q: Are there any hidden fees?
A: There are no hidden fees at all. All prices are listed as is on the website, and during checkout. Our pricing on the website displays monthly terms per default - therefor, prices are often lower when selecting annual payments.

Q: Do you offer additional IP's?
A: We do offer additional IP's at an added cost of $2/IP/month.

Q: Do you offer custom packages?
A: We might be able to! Go ahead and contact our Sales team with your requirements, and we'll see what we can work out.[/quote]
